## Aggregate table
```{r}
aggregate(
  value ~ INTEREST,
  data = melt(Telerobot_ages %>% select(starts_with("Q_GROUP_INTEREST"), 'ResponseId','v') %>% drop_na() %>%     dplyr::rename(COLUMN_DICTIONARY), id=c('ResponseId','v'),variable.name = "INTEREST"),
  mean
)
```
